artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Nōshūya Yasubei
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 101; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 299.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: assembled triptych; male figure at C with wide stance, brandishing a sword, facing L; figure at R wearing armor, ducking, holding white cloak with silver foliage behind him; another male figure at LL falling to the ground, with sword up in air; fight scene in background with heavy rain; purple curtain with white flowers at top
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: 一魁斎芳年画 {Ikkaisai Yoshitoshi ga}
title: Picture of the Soga Brothers Killing Ten Men
